This BMI shows that you are underweight. That is, according to your height, the weight value should be greater in order to have a healthy weight and BMI.
This BMI shows that you are on a normal weight. That is, according to your height, the weight value is healthy and so is your BMI. Keep it in this range!
This BMI shows that you are overweight. That is, according to your height, the weight value should be smaller in order to have a healthy weight and BMI.
This BMI shows that you are obese. That is, according to your height, the weight value should be much smaller in order to have a healthy weight and BMI.
